amendment.description: Amendment directs the Chief of Engineers to transfer the human remains commonly known as the Kennewick Man or the Ancient One to the Washington State Department of Archeology and Historic Preservation, on the condition that the Department disposes of the remains and repatriates the remains to the claimant tribes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
